summary: This bill, the Health and Endocrine Research on personal care products for women Act (HER Act), directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants for research on the impact of personal care products containing endocrine-disrupting chemicals on the female reproductive system. It also provides grants to states for investigating the impact of these products and developing public awareness campaigns.  The bill mandates reports to Congress on research findings and state program results, including lists of safe and harmful products and potential regulatory strategies.
